properties.description: Scrolling breakpoint the animation is triggered from
properties.name: animPosition

properties.description: Fixed sticky wrapper element CSS class name
properties.name: fixedClass

properties.description: Sticky position type         Values: top, bottom, right, left         Default: top
properties.name: side

properties.description: Margin between the sticky and the container boundary
properties.name: spacing

properties.description: Quick access to the sticky wrapper element
properties.name: wrapper

methods.description: Check the animation start position and handle it
methods.name: _animationMonitor

methods.description: Set fixed behavior for the bottom and right sticky
methods.name: _bottomRightFixing

methods.description: Set fixed behavior inside native scroll container
methods.name: _fix

methods.description: Get the distance in pixels between the element and its parent border
methods.name: _getOffsetProp

methods.description: Set fixed behavior for the top and left sticky
methods.name: _topLeftFixing

methods.description: Recalculate sticky wrapper size amd update its position
methods.name: refresh
